Interesting articles from 2018 summer

September 30, 2018

I’ve been a little busy this summer taking a rest, but I’m back again with the selection of articles I found interesting during my “disconnection”. As usual, I get them mostly from Hacker News, so I also link the HN thread in the discussion link.

 The Annoying Habits of Highly Effective People 

Your circumstances are different, so don’t try to copy wealthy people (discussion).

 Why are Enterprises so Slow 

We all know enterprises are slow, so let’s read the umpteenth article about it (discussion).

 How to fail as a new engineering manager

Good lecture for engineers that are discovering the management world (discussion).

 Why You Should (And Shouldn’t) Join a Startup 

Pros and cons about working for a startup or enterprise (discussion).

 ‘Find Your Passion’ Is Awful Advice  

Kill the clichés (discussion).
